long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you bored with the same old new tab page on your Chrome browser? Give TabAnimals a try! This extension is perfect for those who love discovering new things and exploring hidden gems around the world. With TabAnimals, you'll be greeted by captivating images of different wildlife species every time you open a new tab, providing a refreshing escape from the ordinary.

TabAnimals offers more than just beautiful pictures - it also comes with a convenient built-in web search feature right within the new tab, allowing you to browse the internet without ever leaving the page. By installing TabAnimals, you agree to our License Agreement and Privacy Policy, and gain access to the powerful search functionality of Microsoft Bing.

TabAnimals search functions that are being in use by the extension â€“ will be provided by Microsoft Bing. 

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the TabAnimals extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://tabanimals.com/terms) and Policy (https://tabanimals.com/privacy)

Privacy Policy: https://tabanimals.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://tabanimals.com/terms

Thank you for using our products!
